TopicTitle: [1.12.x] God Parts - Parts with Ridiculous Properties [v1.0]

Articles.Content:
God Parts is a mod that:

  • Copies the ion engine and RTG, then alters them to have crazy stats.
  • Allows the XM-50 and Shock Cone intakes to operate on Jool, Duna, and Eve.
  • Buffs all other parts.

The only dependency of this mod is ModuleManager (duh).

Credits: @OrdinaryKerman for teaching me how to make ModuleManager patches and helped with custom textures, the awesome people behind ModuleManager
